messages.subject: And just in case that's not good enough...
messages.msgSnippet: Marlon Brando s Godfather voice:  Milton, my old freind, as it seems we are not able to come to an agreement on this matter, I must turn it over to the
messages.messageBody:
Marlon Brando's Godfather voice: 'Milton, my old freind, as it seems
we are not able to come to an 'agreement' on this matter, I must turn
it over to the family to solve. Sonny, please show Milton where you
place the tsuba to best accomodate this situation'.
